My rabbit suddenly lay down motionless on the forest floor!” he sobbed. The child cried, yes he wanted to say something in a hurry: "Oh, but... but it's not just my rabbit so bad. The animals, plants and people feel bad. The animals are lying around, the plants cannot grow and the people suffer Headaches and are powerless." Robin immediately picked up his bow, rounded up his friends and them decided to look around the forest and ask the people involved what happened.
Families: Folk Tales & Fairy Tales: Robin Hood

Name: Colt Express: Big Box
Description:
The base game, the 2 expansions and a new Bandit* in one box.

(Re)Discover the fun of Colt Express and its 3D train, the one and only Wild West board game in which all shots are allowed to become the richest outlaw.

Experience a new game each time by combining the various contents of the game with:
• Colt Express, The base box
• Colt Express, Horses and Stagecoach
• Colt Express, Marshal and Prisoners


    Message for the first fans of the game: Silk, the new Bandit, will also be available on our e-shop.
Families: Versions & Editions: Big Box Versions of Individual Games

Name: Die Abenteuer des Robin Hood: Die Tochter des Ketzers
Description:
In this stand alone adventure, Adventurers help Marian search for her father, who has gone into hiding after being found guilty of heresy.

With this adventure booklet you can experience another exciting adventure of Robin Hood and his companions. It plays around the same time as Chapter 4, so you should have played at least until Chapter 4 of the base game. All outlaws already have their special skills.

This item was originally made available as a PDF, and later printed as part of Die Abenteuer des Robin Hood - Die Abenteuer Erweiterung.
Families: Folk Tales & Fairy Tales: Robin Hood

Name: Die Abenteuer des Robin Hood: Der Gesandte der Königsmutter
Description:
With this adventure booklet you can experience another exciting adventure of Robin Hood and his companions. It plays around the same time as Chapter 4, so you should have played at least until Chapter 4 of the base game. The Queen Mother's Envoy' must be rescued from the Sheriff's henchmen by Robin and his friends.

All outlaws already have their special skills.

This item was originally made available as a PDF, and later printed as part of Die Abenteuer des Robin Hood - Die Abenteuer Erweiterung.
Families: Folk Tales & Fairy Tales: Robin Hood

Name: Zerywia: Thymor Gods Expansion
Description:
This Zerywia Expansion introduces to the game mighty Seasons Avatars, the Thymor Gods. Receive powerful Blessings, tame the Defiled Elementals, save yourself and the Gods from the Curse of Oblivion , retrieve the legendary Dawn Stones! The expansion modifies the gameplay with new Seasonal Rituals and Weather mechanics, adds new Enemies, Creatures and Saga cards, as well as a special ally, Rarog the Firebird.

Components: 4 Thymor God miniatures, 1 Rarog miniature, 4 Thymor God avatar cards, 4 Thymor Blessing cards, 4 Defiled God cards, 4 Mark of the Thymor cards, 8 Enemy cards, 4 Creature cards, 4 Epic Quest cards, 4 Dawn Stone cards, 4 Weather cards, 8 Sacred Ritual cards, 2 Rarog Saga cards, 4 Naw Saga cards, 1 Help card.

—description from the publisher

Name: Zerywia: Wholeater Expansion
Description:
This Zerywia Board Game Expansion introduces the mighty dragon Wholeater. Try to slay the beast to retrieve legendary treasures, or make him your ally by fullfilling his missions. The expansion also brings a brand new Hero, unique Epic Feat cards and more new Saga cards for your adventures !

Components: 1 Wholeater Dragon miniature, 1 Hero miniature (Sovis), 2 Dragon Avatar cards, 4 Dragon Attack cards, 9 Dragon Mood cards, 3 Agenda cards, 7 Dragon Treasure cards, 13 Hero & Saga cards for Sovis, 5 Alternative Saga cards for Svara Hero, 8 Epic Feat cards, 3 New Saga cards , 1 Help card.

—description from the publisher

Name: Portland
Description:
Each player has his own deck of 52 cards. Each deck is shuffled. You are playing against the other players, over six rounds, trying to build the best combinations. Waste cards early and miss big scores at the end!

—description from the rulebook

At the beginning of each round, each player deals out 5 cards in a row. Then, in turns, the players choose to either draw a card from their personal deck and add that card on top of any card in their row, or pass, dropping out of the round. When all players have passed, the round is over. The 5 card rows are compared and the best poker hand wins points according to a table determined by player count.

Played with a standard deck of cards, published in Reiner Knizia's book Blazing Aces!: A Fistful of Family Card Games.

Name: Chicken Challengers
Description:
Chicken Challengers is a strategic turn based card game that deals with chickens and their constant shenanigans. With over 70+ unique chickens to collect, use their special abilities to help you gain even more chickens!

Take turns drawing or playing chickens to help you collect or make your enemies suffer! In addition, there are other cards like action cards that make others lose chickens, and Challenge Cards to battle other players' chickens and make them your own! But hold on! Other players may also stop you from playing those cards using counter cards.

Be the first person to collect 8 chickens in your hand to win while making sure others don’t collect 8 before you do!

—description from the designer

Name: 5150: Fighter Pilot
Description:
Fighter Pilot! It's not a job, it's an adventure!

Simply put, you're a Fighter Pilot trying to stay alive while completing your Missions. 
They say the Star Navy is the tip of the Gaea Prime spear; well that makes you the tip of the tip!

Your enemies are many.

The Empire is hungry and growing, and that means you're always at war. 
As a Star Navy Fighter Pilot you'll be fighting other humanoids, alien races and things that don't fit into either class.

5150 Fighter Pilot has four Factions and over 16 different fighters to choose from.

And the nice thing is:

     no two Missions (games) will ever play exactly the same. 
     Totally playable solo with rules for a Campaign with a simple way to gauge how well, or bad, you’re doing!


Playable with minis or the color counters we provide!

–description from the publisher

Name: F-Life: Urbanization & Gangs
Description:
Urbanization & Gangs is the first expansion to the dark humor party card game F-Life: A Card Game About Adulthood.

This expansion includes 100 all-new cards, including the new Drug deck  and a new game mechanic.

Be the disappointment your parents always thought you were and become a drug dealer! Become a kingpin with one of the new backstory cards. Get a new profession such as a sign spinner, taxi driver, tattoo artist, and more!

Urbanization & Gangs is a great addition for any fans of F-Life!

Name: Quest for Jannah
Description:
In a playful way reconnect your family while learning more about Islam in an interactive fun way!

Do you want to test your knowledge about Islam and find a way to teach your children more about Islam?
Players will learn that being helpful and kind to their family and others, defines a good Muslim.

Gameplay:
Move around the board acquiring as many city sites as you can. The more you own, the more donations you can collect from the other players. Once you acquire all the city sites in a country set then you are entitled to build one Mosque per site which is given by the Angel. This Mosque must be placed on the corresponding city site. The donations you receive usually, increase with the Mosque.

The player that has the most deeds, is the winner.

This game can be played in three different ways:

     Beginner: Ask the Questions with multiple-choice options.
     Professional: Ask the questions without the multiple-choice options.
     Master: Ask questions without multiple-choice options. The player must answer with an explanation and the references on the question card.


–description from the publisher

Name: Fossilis: Kickstarter Edition Expansions
Description:
All mini expansion included in Fossilis: Kickstarter Edition were sold by the publisher as one bundle.

Included Mini-/Micro-Expansions:

1 Bone Wars Solo Mode
Determined fossil hunters Othniel Marsh and Edward Cope shared a heated rivalry known as the “Bone Wars” in the late 19th century, to see who would dominate the world of dinosaur discovery. This is your chance to test yourself against one of these fierce competitors!

1 Power Tools Micro-Expansion

1 Caution Tape Micro-Expansion

1 Ice Age Mini-Expansion (includes 20 beautiful aqua "Ice Crystals"

1 Scorpion Mini-Expansion (includes 1 scorpion miniature)

2 Undiscovered Species Cards

Name: Shipwrecked!
Description:
Shipwrecked! is a semi-cooperative survival game for up to 4 players. Taking control of ‘Brains’ and ‘Brawn’, players will explore a mysterious island inhabited by pirates, dinosaurs and monsters.

By working together and combining their skills, Brains and Brawn can craft useful tools and weapons that will help them defeat the toughest enemies, and survive long enough to repair the ship and escape. But temptation and betrayal is never far away…

The goal is to escape before the unstable volcano erupts and destroys the island, but the ultimate winner is the one who makes it out alive with the most treasure. It’s survival of the fittest...and richest!

Name: 6: Siege – Year 1: Re-Enforce
Description:
6: Siege - The Board Game is an asymmetrical tabletop game with miniatures for 2 to 4 players, based on Ubisoft’s acclaimed tactical shooter video game, Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six: Siege. Gameplay is fast and frenetic, allowing players to feel the tension of a cinematic assault with simulated real-time gameplay. Players control a team of 5 operators (all attackers or all defenders), with each Operator boasting different gadgets and abilities. Building your team of 5 is a very rewarding step of the game, offering endless possibilities and strategic choices. As the attacker, you will use your explosive arsenal to tear down walls and obstacles to reach your objective! As the defender, you will shape the battleground to your advantage and seek to thwart your opponent’s plans by denying them chances to attack.

Year 1 - Re-Enforce adds 8 operators to the base game. All of them being from the first year, or the first season, of the video game. They expand upon existing mechanisms and provide different options. And with the expanded roster, you’ll have more creative freedom while drafting your squad. Some Operators really benefit from synergies, while others are particularly suited for a specific environment

For the attackers, Blackbeard is a more resilient Operator while Buck and Hibana are wall-breachers above all. Last but not least, Capitão is all about creating – literal – chokepoints with his asphyxiating bolts!

On the defenders’ side, Frost and Caveira provide very powerful reactions the attacker doesn’t want to see triggered! On the other hand, Valkyrie and Echo are all about locating their targets: no one can escape their vigilant eye.

—description from the publisher

Name: Pandoria: Trolls & Trails
Description:
Your scouts have discovered a hidden valley deep in the mountains of Pandoria, divided by rivers and large lakes. Here your people can develop the land undisturbed. But as you begin to inhabit these new lands, you discover that you are not alone: trolls from the surrounding mountains are staking their claims. You compete with the increasingly powerful trolls for the greatest influence in these 7 new territories.
Can you evolve fast enough to be the dominant realm in the end?

Trolls & Trails contains a new double-sided game board to play solo against the trolls, or to have an alternative map containing "trails" over the mountains.

—description from the publisher

Name: Activity Casino
Description: The simple basic recipe of the classic game - guessing terms - is once again the top priority. Activity Casino does without a game board and game pieces. Instead, there is a starting capital in the form of chips that serve as bets, just like in a real casino. Each team gives a tip on how many searched terms the group of actors can correctly guess. If the players are correct, their bet is doubled, otherwise the chips are lost. The performing team is also rewarded depending on the number of tasks solved and the chips won can be used to increase the stake in the next round.
